type.title: Type
type.description: Set to 'fixed' to manually specify a player name or UUID. Set to 'context' to use an entity from loot context.

name.title: Name
name.description: Specifies the name of the player, or the entity's UUID (in hypenated hexadecimal format) whose score to query.

target.title: Target
target.description: Specifies an entity from loot context to query the score of.
